Talon::

Talon smiled and added while her smile turned a bittter one"Then t=
he true must be told, cause you deserve it and I love you... My true name i=
snt Talon... it was Blacknightmare I was once together mi sister, a Minion.=
.. A servant of Unicron... Lord Perseus  and Kenzo is awared of my true ide=
ntity, and they provided me a sactuary and a new life; Now Tucson,do you st=
ill love me or do you hate me with all your heart? do you want to know how =
I finish in Maximal Side?"


From: Sandy 
Sent: Monday, April 05, 2010 9:43=
 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: The Old Maximal Base/Unicron's=
 come back


  
Tucson quickly realizes that his com link was still engaged=
. He gets a slight startled, but with a very sheepish grin on his face, he =
tries to answer Lord Elder the best he can.

"Oh, Lord Elder, Kup, sorry ab=
out that.. I'm fine, nothing's wrong.. Nothing - at all.. I - I.. Um, well,=
 I - just got a very strong batch of Energon and it kind of threw me off gu=
ard.. Caused all sorts of power surges but I assure you I'm no worse for wa=
re. I - was just on my way to Nightstrike when I ran a little low on fuel, =
so I was given something here and it had a few side effects... Look, I'm a =
little tied up right now, I'll definitely get back to you when I have more =
time. Tucson Prime out."

This time he manages to disengage the com link.

=
"Ohh boy, I sure hope he bought that one. It's not like me to lie but some =
things are best kept to ourselves. And this time, I remember where I left o=
ff."

He had not realized it but Tucson was capable of many emotions, love =
being one of them.

Outside the storage area, Rat Trap tries to cover for T=
ucson and looks over to the area while scratching behind his head.

"Hmm, W=
heels went inta the storage bay. He could've had ta replace a tire or two a=
nd is havn' a hard time lookn' for tires that fit his specs. Isn't too easy=
 findn' wheels for that big guy I bet." 

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Pr=
eston Carroll <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
>
> Who: Lord Elder
> Location: Th=
e Ark's command center
> 
> Lord Elder looked over curiously at Kup as Tusc=
on completed his
> communcation, his face somewhat confused and worried. "W=
as it is just
> me or did Tuscon sound a bit flustered?"
> 
> Elder does a =
quick sensor reading, and after a few moments the sensors
> track Tuscon's =
last radio communication as comming from the area in or
> around the old Ma=
ximal base.
> 
> It was only then that Lord Elder heard the screeching of t=
ires over
> the com signal that suddenly cut out.
> 
> "Lord Perseus, Tusco=
n, do you require assistance there?" Lord Elder
> said, obviously misreadin=
g the whole situation.
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
>
